sentence.Network_en: Environmentalists say there is a high risk of pollution from the landfill site.

sentence.Network_en: In most countries the selection a landfill site is governed by rules and regulations.

sentence.Network_en: Temperature has a great effect on landfill gas transport, release and deposit.
sentence.Network_cn: 温度对填埋气体在多孔介质中的储存和释放过程有着重要影响.

entry.def: Landfill is a method of getting rid of very large amounts of rubbish by burying it in a large deep hole.

entry.tran: 垃圾填埋场；垃圾堆填区
entry.def: A landfill is a large deep hole in which very large amounts of rubbish are buried.

example.ex: The rubbish in modern landfills does not rot.
example.tran: 现代垃圾填埋场里的垃圾不会腐烂。

example.ex: ...the cost of disposing of refuse in landfill sites.
example.tran: 垃圾填埋场处理废弃物的成本
